Class IntegerNodeHelper

All Implemented Interfaces:
NodeHelper, NumberNodeHelper
public class IntegerNodeHelper
extends NumberNodeHelperBase
implements NumberNodeHelper

Class IntegerNodeHelper implements numeric functions on nodes whose content is interpreted as integers
